(Yes I know it should have two radial intakes on the front mk 1 to mk 3 adapter, however, I forgot to add them until it had been balanced for VTOL, and I wasn't feeling up to re-balancing at the moment)

(Weapons pending)

Edited July 22, 2014 by Darthzeus
You could use these for the weapons.
Hey guys I'm going to paint my crafts green and black again because Tarzan hasn't posted anything in ages.

You could use these for the weapons.

http://i.imgur.com/k1fKVrr.png

That's what we're looking at for the A model, but with a ratio of 4:1 sepratrons:decouplers

B model will have generic radial decoupler/RCS tank bombs

PS: There's restrictions on who can paint what what colour?

PPS: I see you have kerbtown installed, I've been looking for an aircraft carrier for it, do you know of a good one?

Edited July 22, 2014 by Darthzeus
No, it's just that after our first battle me and Tarzan realised that we had a very similar building style, as a result I started painting my ships yellow and black rather than green and black.

"hyper extended nightmare"-Darthzues

Why was it hyper extended?

"hyper extended nightmare"-Darthzues

Why was it hyper extended?

meaning it had broken away from the rest of the fleet, seeing as a flying a scout sniper into that would be scuicide
i really should make a new space warship, but...
Same here, I'm still trying to build a ship worthy of battling your QE.

Same here, I'm still trying to build a ship worthy of battling your QE.

hilariously enough, at $384,000 it's probably the most economical battleship out there....
...While I woke up this morning and decided the day's project was getting a Scout Sniper mk IV together that might actually be capable of firing weapons without ripping itself apart...
Does anyone else have a projects list?

I've got this so far, 8 I-beams, 8 small yet surprisingly powerful missiles and 2 very large missiles capable of ripping a ship in half (they actually did that in my battle against iamonfire).

Here's proof of my claim:

And a video:

Edited July 23, 2014 by Megalodon 720

I have a (military) projects list in order...

1. Re-Arm all glitched MU combat designs from 0.23.5.

2. Complete a new VTOL Gunship. (MT-16)

3. Finish a new TOP SECRET prototype thing....

Also, the rebooted battle with daemon's almost ready to post, but I still need to fix a glitch in my game.

Another SNSS Nightmare powers up and engages the remaining Scout.

Takes a full Kerbin day to catch it. First shot misses.

Second shot is a hit!

Striped off the solar panels, other wise it seems to be fine.

persist

your move

I've got this so far, 8 I-beams, 8 small yet surprisingly powerful missiles and 2 very large missiles capable of ripping a ship in half (they actually did that in my battle against iamonfire).

http://i.imgur.com/lThXieF.png

Here's proof of my claim:

http://i.imgur.com/BKNPUBg.png

And a video:

After I finish my Arcadia Class Battleship we need to battle.

How many parts?

Also, I would love it. We could use these massive ships as fleet leaders and use smaller ships as escorts. I also think we should keep them at a minimum of 2.6 km from other ships unless attacking.

How about we do my ruleset for battles, Max range is 30km and the minimum is 1km? Also I'm remaking the Arcadia as the old one looks weird, I'm not satisfied (Now you know why I rarely release for VL)
Sure. (10 char)

How about we do my ruleset for battles, Max range is 30km and the minimum is 1km? Also I'm remaking the Arcadia as the old one looks weird, I'm not satisfied (Now you know why I rarely release for VL)

I know the feeling, my ship (Still unnamed) is a Mk-7 and is the first combat ship to use the little missiles on the sides.
I'll take a turn on the VL 2 year stream!!!

Okay, I would love it! I need to get some sleep soon so I can't work on the ship for now.

Make sure you post pics of your battleship before the battle, I need to see it, these ships are awesome.

Tomorrow I might develop a frigate for the battle.

That's what we're looking at for the A model, but with a ratio of 4:1 sepratrons:decouplers

B model will have generic radial decoupler/RCS tank bombs

PS: There's restrictions on who can paint what what colour?

PPS: I see you have kerbtown installed, I've been looking for an aircraft carrier for it, do you know of a good one?

I'll link my Nimitz-class aircraft carrier when I get home.

I'll link my Nimitz-class aircraft carrier when I get home.

That would be greatly appreciated
